#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
double fact(double a)
{
    if(a==0)
        return 1;
    else
        return a*fact(a-1);
}
int main()
{
    double num,num2;
    int test,i,j,x,y;
    cin>>test;
    for(int k=0; k<test;k++)
    {
        cin>>x>>y;
        num=fact(x)/(fact(y)*fact(x-y));
        num2=num;
        for(i=0;num2>=1;num2/=10,i++);
        for(j=0;num>=1;num/=2,j++);
 
        cout<<i<<" "<<j<<endl;
    }
}
